Docs.summary: The generic type arguments of the contained method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The generic type arguments must only be set if the called method is generic.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates setting the GenericTypeArguments of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod> activity. This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample.
[!code-csharp[wfs_InvokeMethod#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_invokemethod/cs/program.cs#5)]

Docs.summary: The name of the method to be invoked when the activity executes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The invoked method must be declared as public.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates setting the MethodName property of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod> activity. This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample.
[!code-csharp[wfs_InvokeMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_invokemethod/cs/program.cs#1)]

Docs.summary: The parameter collection of the method to be invoked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The parameters must be added to the collection in the same order that they appear in the method signature. Parameters cannot be named `TargetObject` or `Result`.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates setting the Parameters of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod> activity. This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample.
[!code-csharp[wfs_InvokeMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_invokemethod/cs/program.cs#1)]

Docs.summary: The return value of the method operation.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates setting the Result property of an <xref:System.Activities.Statements.InvokeMethod> activity. This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample.
[!code-csharp[wfs_InvokeMethod#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_invokemethod/cs/program.cs#2)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the activity’s method is invoked asynchronously.

remarks.format:
